    Facet Class

    Facet.Rd

    Base class for faceting

    Methods

    Public methods

    • Facet$new()

    • Facet$split_data()

    • Facet$get_dimensions()

    • Facet$generate_scales()

    • Facet$clone()

    Method new()

    Initialize faceting

    Usage

    Facet$new(rows = NULL, cols = NULL, scales = "fixed")

    Arguments

    rows

    Variable(s) to use for row facets

    cols

    Variable(s) to use for column facets

    scales

    Scale handling ("fixed", "free", "free_x", "free_y")

    Method split_data()

    Split data into facets

    Usage

    Facet$split_data(data)

    Arguments

    data

    Data frame to split

    Method get_dimensions()

    Calculate layout dimensions

    Usage

    Facet$get_dimensions(data)

    Method generate_scales()

    Generate scales for each facet

    Usage

    Facet$generate_scales(data, original_scales)

    Arguments

    data

    List of faceted data

    original_scales

    Original plot scales

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    Facet$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
